name: TENT Project (Demo)
description:
Get lost in the middle of the dessert with Karkraus and Sarah at the Buenos Aires stop, the least busy of them all. Try to not go crazy.

This is a short demo for my upcoming game, TENT Project (name may not be final). I hope you guys enjoy it!!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Interact

X - Cancel

Follow me on twitter for updates on the project. Also DM me about any bugs you encounter! That would really help me out :D
